title: Keep getting "Unable to connect to server"
body:
I was playing games just fine earlier. then Just 10 minutes ago or so, I started an URF game, and I couldn't chat or move, so I tried restarting my game. That's when I started getting the Unable to connect to server error. I've restarted my computer and router with no luck. I also have port forwarding and everything already set up.

... I really don't want to be punished for something I had no control over

replies.body: I'm not seeing anything widespread at the moment, but we'll be on the lookout.  Are you consistently seeing this issue, or was it just that one game? If it was an isolated case, then it could've been a temporary issue with that particular game server, but if you're seeing this across multiple games it's a sign that there may be something we want to look at more closely.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Esbso5tA,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-05-23T21:15:12.012+0000)
>
> I'm not seeing anything widespread at the moment, but we'll be on the lookout.  Are you consistently seeing this issue, or was it just that one game? If it was an isolated case, then it could've been a temporary issue with that particular game server, but if you're seeing this across multiple games it's a sign that there may be something we want to look at more closely.

It was just that game, but it took hours before I could play again. Thank you for your response.

I have been receiving this today lately
https://i.gyazo.com/d2367f92a6674fd5ff107626b10a249c.png
One other player in the game has accepted  a friend request from me and they are experiencing the same issue, so I know this has to be a server side issue. Can we please get some help?
